page.title: 16THE NELSON INN.2.
page.content: The Nelson Inn(continued from page 15). The public house has got a lounge and a bar but there are no rooms to let. Mr.Rawson is a pleasant person and very patient,qualities of a good landlord.He has been a publican for six years.He works shifts with the people who work with him. The public house sells food seven days a week.There is a set menu all week. In the summer the most popular drink is lager and in the winter the most popular drink is bitter.Each week the customers get through 30 gallons of beer.The least popular drink is mild. The Nelson Inn opens at 12.00 midday and closes at 3.00 p.m. and opens again at 7.00p.m. until 11.00p.m.
